price: noong nagsabi sa kanila si Shu`ayb: “Hindi ba kayo mangingilag magkasala?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ شُعَيۡبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum shuʿaybun alā tattaqūna
